properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v9 v10 v11 v12 v13 v14 v15 v16

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: How great is the sum of them!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: They are more in number than the sand

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God!

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: And see if there be any wicked way in me

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: And lead me in the way everlasting

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: And lead me in the wayâ€¦
